entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: TimeSpan - Parse ISO8601 Durations #72064
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.Tests.PartitionedRateLimiterTests.AllIdleLimitersCleanedUp_DisposeThrows failed in rolling build on net7.0-windows-Release-x86-CoreCLR_checked-Windows.10.Amd64.Open #72060
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 - Alpine Linux > 3.14 #72057
  • [JSInterop] cannot build System.Net.Http.sln #72052
    7.0.0
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorCodeFixer` crashes with `InvalidCastException` #72047
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] QuicConnection API follow up #72027
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char> #72025
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #72026
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 7/5/2022 10:32:06 PM #72030
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback:ThreadDestroyed race condition on shutdown #72023
  • [mono] Invoking function pointers with unmanaged calling convention fails in the full AOT mode #72016
    Future
  • HTTP/2 stress tests failing massively #72015
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix previous frame evaluation in Firefox #72009
    7.0.0
  • ITypeResolutionService.GetType is not decorated with RequiresUnreferencedCode attribute #72008
  • TypeConverter.ConvertFrom does not support trimming but is not attributed as such. #72006
  • Codegen: Bound check not elided in ref struct Span field index access #72004
    8.0.0
  • DataSet corrupting Form Designer Code in NET 6 #71998
  • system.net.security.tests work item timeout on mono #71997
  • Error while building main branch of runtime #71996
  • System.IndexOutOfRangeException when using System.Text.Json 7.0 Preview 5 to do polymorphism serialize/deserialize #71994
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JSImportObject #71990
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt look at the associated Property/Event when accessing methods #71985
  • System.Text.Json can't deserialize type with more than 64 ctor parameters. #71984
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal] ClientWebSocket upgrade response details #25918
    7.0.0
  • Hitting LibraryImport asserts in VS #72036
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Span<T> and ReadOnlySpan<T> in source-generated marshalling #69281
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Update to the `LibraryImport` custom marshalling shape #70859
    7.0.0
  • Add X509ChainPolicy to SslOptions #71191
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.ToString("MMM", CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture("DE-de")) returns an extra period in netcore #72061
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #20234
    Future
  • Targets of variant static interface method resolution #71319
    7.0.0
  • improve `you must install .NET Desktop Runtime` with the `updater of .NET Framwork` UI, instead of a weird window #71993
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicException #70669
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\tailpgo\\tailpgo.cmd #71519
    7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBuilder ignores sections containing an empty list #71295
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: WebSockets over HTTP/2 #69669
    7.0.0
  • Exception in chuncked response #68581
    6.0.8
  • JIT: another case of bad interaction of GDV and boxing #69621
    6.0.x
  • libgomp conflict on Linux arm64 #53002
    Future
  • NET 7.0-preview.5: Compatibility question #71259
  • Add AOP capabilities #26942
    Future
  • Port JIT and GC to C# #10158
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\SequentialLayout\\ManagedSequential\\ManagedSequential\\ManagedSequential.cmd #71987
    7.0.0
  • `System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests` crash on coreclr/windows/x64 #71995
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #69140
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_BoostDocs_Simple #70160
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70022
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #66014
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #66009
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions performance regressions #65187
    7.0.0
  • Q: runtime pal.h declarations #37310
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Create new tests about debugging DIM #69747
    7.0.0
  • JsonPatchDocument does not work properly with JsonNode objects #71074
  • RuntimeLicenseContext.GetSavedLicenseKey throws exception for dynamic assemblies #51924
    7.0.0
  • Building CLR with macOS 13 SDK beta does not succeed #71561
    7.0.0
  • Investigate why createdump generated dumps are so large on MacOS #68604
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WASM - AOT compilation - RuntimeError: null function or function signature #62203
    6.0.x
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Attributes #69734
    Future
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator is not setting the correct version number in build/publish #49003
    7.0.0
  • Customizing crossgen2 arguments when using PublishReadyToRun #62065
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest failures #71986
  • [wasm] `JSImportExportTests.JSImportObjectArray` failing on `v8` with `ES6 module JavaScriptTestHelper was not imported yet, please call JSHost.Import() first.` #71952
    7.0.0
  • TPL Dataflow TransformManyBlock support for IAsyncEnumerable #30863
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException #68461
    7.0.0
  • [HttpListener][Managed] HttpListenerWebSocketContext.WebSocket.Close should nop after Abort() #22013
    Future
  • Inconsistent GetRuntimeProperties() Behavior #28056
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • If the base type is a sequential zero-sized type, treat a derived auto-layout type as starting from field offset 0. #72065
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Properly report `TypedReference` with `ref` fields. #72062
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript from solutions #72059
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add missing inlining attribute (System.Numerics.Vector3) #72058
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Utilize new APIs more in System.Formats.Asn1 #72055
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Rename WaitAsync and RateLimitPartition methods #72054
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Raise json deserializer max ctor parameter count #72053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • [mono] Build mono logging profiler on s390x #72049
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Show correct and complete function names on callstack #72048
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Support top-level statements in regex analyzer #72046
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix Tar stream seeking, flushing, and argument validation #72045
    area-System.IO
  • Mark JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver as nullable and linker-safe #72044
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix issue where the code fixer is not preserving the leading and trailing trivia for the regex generator #72042
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix ConsoleStream.Flush to not throw for stdin #72035
    area-System.Console
  • Utilize ProtocolException for HTTP/2 in HttpStress #72034
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] System.Net.Quic API made public #72031
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Pass the pending exception correctly from interp_runtime_invok… #72028
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add support for specifying Kerberos package on Linux/macOS #72024
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wip][wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Work around the double meaning of `IsMultiRegNode` #72020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add crossgen2 for LoongArch64. #72017
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Added exception handling for Firefox onEval #72011
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Get rid of hardcoded sleep in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #72010
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Backport action: fix link to set org membership visibility #72005
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #72002
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Centralize calling convention handling #71999
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use u8 in a few more places #71992
    area-Meta
  • More reliably clean up more SafeHandle instances #71991
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Provide upgrade response details #71757
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PropertyVisibilityTests.cs: Fix invalid change in tests merged earlier #72043
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add the approved span marshallers and remove the v1 model #71989
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve argument validation for Rfc2898DeriveBytes #72050
    area-System.Security
  • add ValidationPolicy to ssl options #71961
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for EventSourceGeneration). #71662
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement new QuicException proposal #71432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #71319 #71461
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fixes #71295 #71924
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #71943
    area-System.Net
  • Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream. #71971
    area-System.Console
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Avoid calling mono_metadata_type_hash () on the container clas… #71764
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.8
  • Add clrgc binary to sharedFx #72032
    area-GC-coreclr, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #72040
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm] Add new `wasm-experimental` workload #71974
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Delete unrelated test file from System.Console.Tests #72033
    area-System.Console
  • Disable FSW test on OSX #72029
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable `S.T.RegularExpressions FunctionalTests` tests failing due to linker issues #71875
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid OOMing in very large functions when checking LIR #71066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #71171
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.8
  • [release/6.0] Fix debugging on Mac and iOS #71731
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.8
  • [release/6.0] Correctly format chuncked response with Content-Length header #70744
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-compatibility, 6.0.8
  • Add logic for selecting the right version of pgort140 #71968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow pushing narrowing casts into GC operands #72003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expect UnauthorizedAccessException in tvOS if extracting fifo from tar without elevation #71175
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add TAR tests that verify ExtractToFile works with special files #71988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix leak caused by IsCertInKeychain #72001
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [QUIC] fixes failing assert #72022
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove unused property #72018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add test which reproduces but in complex framework resolution #71959
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Delete the custom gitignore file #72019
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] mark JSImportGenerator C# only #72007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Rebucket tests that fail with NativeAOT and fix some #71819
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Remove android special case from eng/native/naming.props #71953
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve Generics support in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #71619
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Move ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller to the v2 design #71978
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • [wasm] Fix some failing `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests` #71976
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Stop requiring bidirectional support for `MarshalMode.Default` #71977
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Refactor Rfc2898DeriveBytes to support spans #71888
    area-System.Security
  • Moved call to TryLoadGenericMetaTypeNullability #71851
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Break apart source-build intermediate which exceeds AzDO size limit #71949

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0

    area-ILTools-coreclr
